content: --अंग {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} inward, internal, comprehended, included (with <ab>abl.</ab>); त्रयमंतरंगं पूर्वेभ्यः <ls>Pat. Sūtra</ls>. {2} proximate, related to, essential to or referring to the essential part of the अंग or base of a word (<ab>opp.</ab> बहिरंग); धातूपसर्गयोः कार्यमंतरंगं <ls>P. VIII. 3. 74</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls> {3} dear, most beloved (अत्यंतप्रिय); स्वपिति सुखमिदानीमंतरंगः कुरंगः <ls>Ś. 4.</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab> (--गं {1} the inmost limb or organ, the heart, mind; संतुष्टांतरंगः <ls>Dk. 11</ls>;
